title: 08/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the comments made by Kevin Durant and Draymond Green about the downfall of the Warriors dynasty and why they aren’t really addressing exactly what happened. He explains why teams should be cautious about pursuing Aaron Rodgers after his final season with the Packers. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl champion LeSean McCoy joins the show to talk about what it's like to play alongside great quarterbacks like Tom Brady and Patrick Mahomes. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
